Annie came into work the next day and greeted Phil.

"Hey, Phil! How are you this morning?" She said cheerily

"Oh, you know, the usual. You're late, by the way, so that'll be some punishment." Phil said as he pressed a button under his desk. Immediately, Annie's clothes became tighter, a twenty pound gain! Her breasts starting straining her blouse and her skirt rode up some.

info.brief_description: An gets in trouble at work, with strange consequences.
info.description:
Anne is 5'8, brown haired, brown eyed, with d cups.

Anne works at an office, and continuously gets in trouble for not following orders. After being fed up with this, her boss, Phil, decides to make her grow whenever she breaks a rule or gets in trouble.
